headline: Ball Corporation Announces $250 Million Accelerated Share Repurchase
summary: Ball Corporation (NYSE: BALL) announced today an agreement to repurchase approximately $250 million of its outstanding common stock in a privately negotiated, accelerated stock repurchase transaction with Crédit Agricole CIB, using cash on hand and available borrowings.
